metadata.title: CVE-2019-10181 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: It was found that in icedtea-web up to and including 1.7.2 and 1.8.2 executable code could be injected in a JAR file without compromising the signature verification. An attacker could use this flaw to inject code in a trusted JAR. The code would be executed inside the sandbox.

criterions.comment: icedtea-web package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
